channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Fed’s Waller backs December rate cut — and he’s ‘unlikely’ to change his mind. Here’s why.

item.title: SpaceX hits a new milestone that shows why it’s dominating modern spaceflight
item.description: Elon Musk says his aerospace company will launch 90% of the world’s payload this year. Key to that goal is keeping costs down with reusable boosters.

item.title: Bitcoin just wiped out all of its 2025 gains. What a crypto winter could look like.

item.title: S&P 500, Nasdaq book their worst day in a month. More selling could be on the way.
item.description: Monday’s selloff in U.S. stocks was accompanied by a troubling development that could signal more selling pressure on the way.

item.title: Stanley Druckenmiller rebuilds Big Tech bets, dips into stablecoins with Figure Technology
item.description: Druckenmiller's Duquesne Family Office initiated a $96 million position in Amazon and a $56 million holding in Meta during the third quarter.

item.title: Peter Thiel's hedge fund dumps Nvidia stake, cuts back Tesla position
